frontmatter.title: Managing CloudFormation stack with Serverless Framework
frontmatter.description: Serverless Framework support Cloudformation syntax in serverless.yml. You can add new resources and override / modify the resources generated by Serverless in serverless.yml.

frontmatter.title: Managing CloudFormation stack with Serverless Framework
frontmatter.description: Serverless Framework support Cloudformation syntax in serverless.yml. You can add new resources and override / modify the resources generated by Serverless in serverless.yml.
